sprint_goal: Establish Secure Cloud Infrastructure & CI/CD Pipeline
epic_coverage: Cloud Infrastructure & DevOps, Security & Identity, Web Portals
key_deliverables: AKS/ACR/Postgres Infrastructure; GitHub Actions Pipeline; Azure AD B2C Config; Basic Admin Layout
demo_objectives: Show infrastructure deployment; Demonstrate Login flow; Show CI pipeline run
success_metrics: Environment active; Auth working; Pipeline green
mitigation_strategies: Use identity specialist or starter pack
external_dependencies: Azure Subscription, Azure AD B2C Tenant

sprint_goal: Core Business Logic: Products, Docs, & Geospatial
key_deliverables: Product API; Doc Upload Service; Geo Routing Engine; Basic Mobile Warranty UI
demo_objectives: Register product via API; Upload invoice; Visualize service center polygons; Show Mobile Card UI
success_metrics: API P95 < 500ms; Uploads working; Routing accurate
external_dependencies: Mapbox API (optional for this sprint, mostly backend)

key_deliverables: Mobile Offline Sync; Background Location Tracking; Brand Analytics Charts; Map Visualization
demo_objectives: Show offline data persistence; Demonstrate background tracking; Show Analytics Dashboard
success_metrics: Sync reliability; Background location battery usage; Dashboard load time
risk_factors: Mobile background location reliability across OS
